eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; AT 01:41 PM ON SEP 18, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:35 AM SEP 20, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Silver Alert has been issued for Phoenix AZ. The Phoenix Police is looking forRichard Ryan last seen on foot wearing  black cargo pants, light grey shirt, blue slip on shoes, and Army Ranger hat. If you have contact with this Silver Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
